snippet: Maria de Villota was found dead in her hotel room in Seville, 15 months after she sustained multiple skull fractures in a Formula One testing accident.
abstract: Spanish racing driver Maria de Villota is found dead in her hotel room in Seville, 15 months after she sustained multiple skull fractures--and lost an eye--in a Formula One testing accident in England.
lead_paragraph: Maria de Villota was found dead in her hotel room in Seville, 15 months after she sustained multiple skull fractures in a Formula One testing accident.

headline.main: Spanish Formula One Driver Found Dead
headline.print_headline: Spanish Driver, 33, Is Found Dead in Her Hotel Room
